channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Very bight security spotlight directed at neighbours, 11th November
item.description:
There is a security spotlight with a deficient motion sensor which turns on and off all night long every day, the spotlight is very bright and pointed at neighbouring residential accommodation. We have attempted to contact the neighbours unsuccessfully.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): The Mothers Square, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tyres dumped and litter all along pavement, 11th November
item.description:
Two tyres have been dumped and left for several weeks on the pavement at the beginning of Allandale Avenue. There is also a huge amount of rubbish all along the pavement and road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4a, Allandale Avenue, Temple Fortune, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hartland Road NW6, 11th November
item.description:
All along Hartland, leaves have piled up to dangerous levels. Also, Veolia has not been sweeping off Salusbury road into Hartland (see picture) as they are contracted to do daily.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hartland Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubish not collected, 11th November
item.description:
Again the blue bin bags and carton boxes were left behind

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, D'Arblay Street, Camden Town, London

item.title: Two fly tipped matresses, 11th November
item.description:
There are two flytipped mattresses a few paces beyond the entrance gate into Sparrow Woods on the right. They are a few paces apart. The What3Words locations are miles.buck.trades and lazy.casual.gent

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crofton, London

item.title: Cut back bushes / weeds, 11th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, The Greenway, Poverest, London

item.title: Tarmac has lifted, 11th November
item.description:
The pavement/tarmac outside my house 86 exeter road has lifted due to the london clay / tree roots. this has changed recently and i am worried it is a trip hazard and also near my water and gas main.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Exeter Road, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cut weeds / bushes, 11th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, The Greenway, Poverest, London

item.title: Loud Music being played from shopfront, 11th November
item.description:
The shop 'Relentless London' has set up a large speaker on the floor facing out of the shop playing *very* loud music. Becoming difficult to hear conversations in near by business.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Rupert Street, Bloomsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 11th November
item.description:
Fly tipping

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Simnel Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Holes in road where white lines should be!, 11th November
item.description:
It looks like a load of the white lines (middle of road) have just been hollowed out and a big hole left in their place! They've been like this for weeks now and nothing gets done....it might not be an 'immediate danger' to the public but if a bike wheel goes into one of these it won't be happy days - please do something good with the Council Tax and sort this road out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Cray Road, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Mattress been dumped near the bottom of Durham Rise. Been there a few days.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Manthorp Road, Plumstead

item.title: Fly tipping, 11th November
item.description:
Clothes and rubbish dumped on the side of lakedale power stools on kashgar road Please Remove

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kashgar Road, Plumstead

item.title: No road markings!, 11th November
item.description:
There are absolutely no road markings at the right turn lane/entrance to Tesco superstore and the adjacent businessness - this means that cars are waiting across the road because of poor positioning and the queues are getting worse! Please PLEASE mark out the white lines and and rhs arrow on the road ASAP before the Xmas rush frays tempers....
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Edgington Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 11th November
item.description:
Black bags/ boxes and furniture dumped all the way down St Nicolas Road from the Church down to the junction of Benares Road. Please remove

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): St Nicholas Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 11th November
item.description:
Bag full of leaves has been left outside 44 churchmanorway. This is my 4th report over the period of 6 weeks. Can this be removed. Thank you

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Church Manorway, Abbey Wood

item.title: Bed & Mattress fly-tipped to pavement, 11th November
item.description:
Bed & Mattress fly-tipped to pavement opposite Haften Road, adjacent to Ashmore Court. This has not come from Ashmore Court. Residents are monitoring activity and it is being dumped from vehicles. The location is in a blind spot, not overlooked by properties. Please can some CCTV be deployed to catch these in action.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dowanhill Road, Catford South, London
Report on FixMyStreet
